name: Rumble Womble
description:
Rumble Womble

Rumble Womble is a 2D fast-paced multiplayer PvP where players have the special ability to influence how a round plays out by making items or game elements, such as guns or boxes, not real.

In a round, the enemy team is not aware of what you choose to not be real. This leads to interesting moments where, for example, a player picks up a gun, hoping to get a kill, only to realize the gun shoots confetti instead of bullets.

Controls:  

WASD for movement 

Left mouse to shoot

Right Mouse to pickup weapon

Connection:

(The servers list refreshes every 5 seconds)

(Finding a server might take a bit of time so please be patient.  If there is no server showing up after a minute , try opening the game again. )

You can connect with your friends via classic IP and PORT if you choose "Use LAN". If you are not familiar with that stuff you can let us take care of that for you.

If you do not host on your network you have the possibility to make your server public so anyone can join it. 

If you choose to host a private game or via your own network you'll need to tell your friends the code so they can join( bottom left corner). 

And your friends must enter it here.
